thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Bill Green

author: Bill Green
title: Bill Green
text:
Best thing since the invention of water and dirt. It saved us from home flood damage twice. $15,000 was my cost for the first flood in 2001 that convinced us we needed SOMETHING to give us peace of mind. I can't say enough GREAT things for this system and for the PROFESSIONAL customer service/technical assistance. It's a system that shuts off your water immediately after sensing water flow, NOT after water is all over your floors.
I have recommended FloLogic to many many people that are also thankful for having this tremendous system. Call me anytime to discuss this product. Bill 727-743-5836.
